description: It's Halloween here on ExtraBigDicks and we have quite the treat for you. With us is, Russian born, Alex Matthews. Alex is 23 and has been featured on our brother site CircleJerkBoys.com. Originally from Moscow, he now calls South Florida home. His 'treat' for this afternoon is a blast from our past, Mr. Ricco Furtado. Ricco  was first on our site a couple of years ago. Ricco recently moved back to Miami and is living on the beach so he's enjoying the sun, the fun and the boys. Alex knows all about that since he likes to spend his free time watching movies, listening to music and hanging out with the boys (clothing optional). Ricco is also more of a home body. He loves to cook and relax at home with friends. We imagine that this swarthy stud packin over 10' can cook pretty damn well in or out of the kitchen. Both of these boys love to travel and while Alex wants to return to Italy; Ricco wants to visit Cape Cod in South Afri--Wait a minute--Cape Cod? Ok, we're gonna assume Ricco meant Cape Town in South Africa.
title: Trick & Treat, Scene #01
